title: Retro-Bindery Update
author: VD
content_html:
If you’re having any trouble retro-backing the bindery by acquiring an edition of THE ILIAD or THE ODYSSEY, please note that you can now do so via NDM Express as well.

In fact, NDM has actually gotten ahead of us and is now offering A SEA OF SKULLS Volumes One and Two for non-subscribers too.

DISCUSS ON SG
